text:
Bras Basah MRT Station (CC2) is an MRT Station in Singapore. It is along the Circle MRT Line.
The station is located near Singapore Art Museum and a few minutes walk to National Museum of Singapore.
Prior to the opening of the station, it was supposed to be called Museum.
Following Stations.
Previous: Dhoby Ghaut (CC1/NS24/NE6)Next: Esplanade (CC3)
